member.summary: Checks if a person exists based on thier id.

member.summary: Checks if a course exists using the course id.

member.summary: Checks if a student exists.

member.summary: Checks if a teacher exists based on thier teacher id.

member.summary: Get a list of students that are enrolled in a particular course using the course id.

member.summary: Gets a list of courses a particular student is on using thier student id.

member.summary: Gets all the admin details

member.summary: Gets all the people listed as admins

member.summary: Gets the course object by course id.
